name: Ramplike
description:
Defend your castle agaisnt increasing waves of attacking ships. 

Ensure your castles are surrounded to stay alive.

Between waves pick upgrades to power up.

Controls

  • WASD - Move Cursor
  • 1/2 Toggle Build Modes during defend stage
  • Space - Confirm Action

I set out to make a cool little roguelike re-imaging of rampart and ended up getting bored.  Releasing this in it's current state for posterity.  Hope you enjoy what's there.
